    #zym-trigger-v2 {
    height: calc(100% - 60px);
    position: absolute;
    width: 1px;
    left: 0;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: space-between;
    }
    .zym-button-spinner {
    height: 12px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    border-width: 2px;
    border-style: solid;
    border-top-color: transparent;
    border-right-color: transparent;
    background-color: transparent;
    margin-right: 8px;
    }
    .zym-button-spinner-rotate {
    width: 12px;
    transition: transform 200000s;
    transform: rotate(200000000deg)
    }
    .zym-button-spinner-hide {
    width: 0px;
    margin-right: 0;
    border-color: transparent;
    }
    #update { position: absolute }
    .zym-confirmation-container {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    width: 100%;
    }
    .zym-confirmation-container>div {
    width: 100%;
    }
    .zym-confirmation {
    width: 100%;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 16px;
    }
    .zym-confirmation-start {
    position: absolute;
    z-index: -1;
    }
    .zym-confirmation-end {
    position: relative;
    z-index: 10;
    }
    .zym-checkmark {
    height: calc(0.8 * 100px);
    aspect-ratio: 1;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background-color: #2ECC71;
    z-index: 0;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    }
    .zym-cross {
    height: calc(0.6 * 100px);
    width: calc(0.6 *100px);
    border-radius: 50%;
    background-color: #ff0000;
    z-index: 0;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    }
    .zym-confirmation-start .zym-checkmark,
    .zym-confirmation-start .zym-cross {
    transform: scale(0);
    }
    .zym-confirmation-end .zym-checkmark,
    .zym-confirmation-end .zym-cross {
    transform: scale(1);
    transition: transform 0.5s ease-in-out;
    transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.1, 0.75, 0.25, 1.25);
    }
    .zym-tick {
    position: absolute;
    background-color: white;
    width: calc(0.8 * 8px);
    border-radius: calc(0.8 * 4px);
    }
    .zym-shorter-tick {
    height: calc(0.6 * 25px);
    transform: translate(calc(0.6 * 4px), calc(0.6 * 1px)) rotate(-45deg) translate(calc(0.6 * -20px), calc(0.6 * -9px));
    }
    .zym-longer-tick {
    height: calc(0.6 * 50px);
    transform: translate(calc(0.6 * 4px), calc(0.6 * 1px)) rotate(45deg);
    }
    .zym-cross-tick-a {
    height: calc(0.6 * 50px);
    transform: rotate(45deg);
    }
    .zym-cross-tick-b {
    height: calc(0.6 * 50px);
    transform: rotate(-45deg);
    }
    .zym-checkmark .zym-cover {
    background-color: #2ECC71;
    }
    .zym-cross .zym-cover {
    background-color: #ff0000;
    }
    .zym-cover {
    position: absolute;
    width: calc(0.6 * 60px);
    height: calc(0.6 * 60px);
    }
    .zym-confirmation-start .zym-cover {
    transform: scale(1);
    }
    .zym-confirmation-end .zym-cover {
    transform: translateX(calc(0.6 * 30px)) scaleX(0.01);
    transition: transform 0.5s ease-in-out;
    }
    .zym-confirmation .zym-label {
    font-size: 16px;
    font-weight: normal;
    }
    .zym-confirmation-start .zym-label {
    transform: scaleY(0);
    height: 0;
    }
    .zym-confirmation-end .zym-label {
    color: #444;
    transform: scaleY(1);
    height: auto;
    text-align: center;
    transition: transform 0.5s ease;
    }
    .zym-delays { position: absolute }
    .zym-delays>amp-carousel { height: 1px; width: 1px }
    .zym-delays>amp-carousel .amp-carousel-button { display: none; }
